name: Tumblr - Add Link the link button
description: Replaces the boring "Link" post icon with a GIF of Link from Legend of Zelda, moving the link icon out of the way and then standing in it's place. Inspired by a GIF posted on Tumblr by http://m4ster-shortpants.tumblr.com/
